blogPost.excerpt: HiHo is a face-forward social app for meeting interesting people and having great video conversations. With asynchronous replies and infinite threading, everyone can participate at any time. The app offers both public forums as well as private DMs.
blogPost.body: HiHo is a face-forward social app for meeting interesting people and having great video conversations. With asynchronous replies and infinite threading, everyone can participate at any time. The app offers both public forums as well as private DMs.
blogPost.title: HiHo - Asynchronous video discussion forums with infinite threading
blogPost.author: Ryan Hoover

previous.excerpt: CommerceBooster is the first open-source, UI template for B2B eCommerce. It’s available for free on the Figma Community and optimized for commercetools and Vue Storefront. It literally saves months of work for anyone starting B2B eCommerce projects.
previous.title: CommerceBooster - An open-source B2B UI template for e-commerce

localize.description: CommerceBoosterは、B2B eコマースのための初のオープンソース、UIテンプレートです。Figma Communityで無料で公開されており、commercytoolsとVue Storefrontに最適化されています。B2Bのeコマースプロジェクトを始める人にとって、文字通り数ヶ月の作業を軽減することができます。
localize.tagline: eコマースのためのオープンソースB2B UIテンプレート

localize.description: CommerceBooster是第一个开源的B2B电子商务的UI模板。它可以在Figma社区免费使用，并针对commercetools和Vue Storefront进行了优化。它实际上为任何开始B2B电子商务项目的人节省了几个月的工作。
localize.tagline: 一个用于电子商务的开源B2B UI模板

localize.description: CommerceBooster是第一個開源的B2B電子商務的UI模板。它可以在Figma社區免費使用，並針對commercetools和Vue Storefront進行了優化。它實際上爲任何開始B2B電子商務項目的人節省了幾個月的工作。
localize.tagline: 一個用於電子商務的開源B2B UI模板
